content: cut cc variegated brown 1 leaving a tail to sew in later stitch count 3 + 90+ 3 = 96 this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way day 9 hosta row 157 - 168 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge increase pattern as row 9 & 10 knit until row 168 introducing cc green 2 as needed the hosta motif is 18 stitches wide and is repeated 4 times across the width of the scarf this motif requires a little bit of concentration so i d suggest using a ruler or similar to read each line cut cc green 2 leaving a tail to sew in later stitch count 3 + 83+ 3 = 89 copyright 2024 suzi ashworth for folkestone harbour yarn day 8 terracotta planter row 145 - 156 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge increase pattern as row 9 & 10 knit until row 156 introducing cc terracotta 1 as needed the planter motif is 18 stitches wide and is repeated 3 times across the width of the scarf with a 4th planter being worked from the chart on the increased edge cut cc terracotta 1 leaving a tail to sew in later stitch count 3 + 77 + 3 = 83 this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way day 7 daisy row 132 - 145 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge increase pattern as row 9 & 10 knit until row 145 introducing cc pink 1 cc orange 1 & mc white as needed the daisy motif is 13 stitches wide and is repeated 4 times across the width of the scarf with a 5th daisy being worked from the chart on the increased edge cut cc s orange 1 & pink 1 leaving tails to sew in later rejoin mc white stitch count 3 + 71 + 3 = 77 copyright 2024 suzi ashworth for folkestone harbour yarn day 6 comma butterfly row 117 - 130 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge increase pattern as row 9 & 10 knit until row 130 introducing cc orange 1 & brown 1 as needed the comma butterfly motif is 19 stitches wide and is repeated 3 times across the width of the scarf after your first increase place markers every 19 stitches cut cc s orange 1 & brown 1 leaving tails to sew in later stitch count 3 + 64 + 3 = 70 this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way day 5 english lavender row 99-116 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge increase pattern as row 9 & 10 knit until row 116 introducing cc lavender
